BEFORE:
p = x.flatten(2)
        p = p.unsqueeze(0)
        p = p.transpose(0, 3)
        p = p.squeeze(3)
        e = self.linear(p)
        x = p + e

        x = self.tr(x)
        x = x.unsqueeze(3)
        x = x.transpose(0, 3)
        x = x.reshape(b, self.c2, w, h)
        return x
AFTER:
p = x.flatten(2).unsqueeze(0).transpose(0, 3).squeeze(3)
        return self.tr(p + self.linear(p)).unsqueeze(3).transpose(0, 3).reshape(b, self.c2, w, h)
